document.full_text: dirk nowitzki and the mavericks have pulled off another stunning comeback against miami, tying the n.b.a. finals at two games each.
document.title: finals | mavericks 86, heat 83: nowitzki shakes fever and rallies mavericks
lines_and_colors: dirk nowitzki and the mavericks have pulled off another stunning comeback against miami, tying the n.b.a. finals at two games each.
